public class Heap {
  private int[] a; // æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä»ä¸‹æ ‡1å¼€å§‹å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®
  private int n;  // å †å¯ä»¥å­˜å‚¨çš„æœ€å¤§æ•°æ®ä¸ªæ•°
  private int count; // å †ä¸­å·²ç»å­˜å‚¨çš„æ•°æ®ä¸ªæ•°

  public Heap(int capacity) {
    a = new int[capacity + 1];
    n = capacity;
    count = 0;
  }

  public void insert(int data) {
    if (count >= n) return; // å †æ»¡äº†
    ++count;
    a[count] = data;
    int i = count;
    while (i/2 > 0 && a[i] > a[i/2]) { // è‡ªä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šå †åŒ–
      swap(a, i, i/2); // swap()å‡½æ•°ä½œç”¨ï¼šäº¤æ¢ä¸‹æ ‡ä¸ºiå’Œi/2çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
      i = i/2;

  }
 }

public void removeMax() {
  if (count == 0) return -1; // å †ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®
  a[1] = a[count];
  --count;
  heapify(a, count, 1);
}

private void heapify(int[] a, int n, int i) { // è‡ªä¸Šå¾€ä¸‹å †åŒ–
  while (true) {
    int maxPos = i;
    if (i*2 <= n && a[i] < a[i*2]) maxPos = i*2;
    if (i*2+1 <= n && a[maxPos] < a[i*2+1]) maxPos = i*2+1;
    if (maxPos == i) break;
    swap(a, i, maxPos);
    i = maxPos;
  }
}

private static void buildHeap(int[] a, int n) {
  for (int i = n/2; i >= 1; --i) {
    heapify(a, n, i);
  }
}

private static void heapify(int[] a, int n, int i) {
  while (true) {
    int maxPos = i;
    if (i*2 <= n && a[i] < a[i*2]) maxPos = i*2;
    if (i*2+1 <= n && a[maxPos] < a[i*2+1]) maxPos = i*2+1;
    if (maxPos == i) break;
    swap(a, i, maxPos);
    i = maxPos;
  }
}

public static void sort(int[] a, int n) {
  buildHeap(a, n);
  int k = n;
  while (k > 1) {
    swap(a, 1, k);
    --k;
    heapify(a, k, 1);
  }
}

//æ ¹æ®ä½œè€…ä»£ç æ•´ç†çš„c++ç‰ˆæœ¬å †æ’åºï¼Œå…¶ä¸­swap(arr, 1, k-1);å¤„ï¼Œä½œè€…ç¬”è¯¯é”™å†™æˆswap(arr, 1, k);äº†
void heapify(int arr[], int i, int len) {
while (true) {
int maxpos = i;
if (2 * i-1 < len && arr[i] < arr[2 * i-1]) {
maxpos = 2 * i-1;
}
if (2 * i < len && arr[maxpos] < arr[2 * i ]) {
maxpos = 2 * i;
}
if (maxpos == i) {
break;
}
swap(arr, maxpos, i);
i = maxpos;
}
}
void buildheap(int arr[], int len) {
for (int i = len / 2; i > 0; --i) {
heapify(arr, i, len);
}
}

void heapsort(int arr[], int len) {
buildheap(arr, len);//å»ºå †
int k = len;
while (k > 0){
swap(arr, 1, k-1);
--k;
heapify(arr, 1, k);
}

for (int i = 0; i < len; i++){
std::cout << arr[i] << ",";
}
std::cout << std::endl;
}
å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ = çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹*2å’Œçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹* 2 + 1, é‚£çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹= å­èŠ‚ç‚¹/2 å’Œï¼ˆå­èŠ‚ç‚¹-1ï¼‰/2ï¼Œ åˆ™æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹å°±æ˜¯n/2, é‚£n/2ä¹‹åçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ˜¯å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹.

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
struct Heap {
int size;
int curr;
bool (*compare)(int, int);
int ele[0];
};

typedef Heap MaxHeap;
typedef Heap MinHeap;
void swin(Heap* h);
void sink(Heap* h);
Heap* resize(Heap* h, int size);
bool greater(int x, int y)
{
return x > y;
}
bool less(int x, int y)
{
return x < y;
}
MaxHeap* CreateMaxHeap(int n)
{
MinHeap* h = (MinHeap*)malloc(sizeof(MinHeap) + 4*(n+1));
if (h) {
h->size = n;
h->curr = 0;
h->compare = less;
}
return h;
}
MinHeap* CreateMinHeap(int n)
{
MaxHeap* h = (MaxHeap*)malloc(sizeof(MaxHeap) + 4*(n+1));
if (h) {
h->size = n;
h->curr = 0;
h->compare = greater;
}
return h;
}
Heap* Insert(Heap* h, int value)
{
if (h->curr >= h->size) {
h = resize(h, h->size*2);
}
h->curr++;
h->ele[h->curr] = value;
swin(h);
return h;
}
Heap* resize(Heap* h, int size)
{
h->size = size;
size++;
h = (Heap*)realloc(h, sizeof(Heap) + (4*size));
return h;
}

//ä¸Šæµ®
void swin(Heap* h)
{
int N = h->curr;
int p = N/2;
while ( N > 1 && h->compare(h->ele[p], h->ele[N]) ) {
std::swap(h->ele[p], h->ele[N]);
N = p;
p = N/2;
}
}

//ä¸‹æ²‰
void sink(Heap* h)
{
int N = h->curr;
int pos = 1;
int l = 2*pos;
while (l <= N) {
int r = 2*pos + 1;
if ( r <= N && h->compare(h->ele[l], h->ele[r]) ) {
l = r;
}
if (h->compare(h->ele[l], h->ele[pos]))break;
std::swap(h->ele[l], h->ele[pos]);
pos = l;
l = 2 * pos;
}
}

int top(Heap* h)
{
return h->curr >= 1 ? h->ele[1] : INT_MIN;
}

bool pop(Heap* h)
{
if (top(h) == INT_MIN) {
return false;
}
std::swap(h->ele[h->curr], h->ele[1]);
h->curr--;
sink(h);
return true;
}
void ReleaseHeap(Heap* h)
{
h->size = 0;
free(h);
}
int main()
{
MaxHeap* h = CreateMaxHeap(10);
for (int i=0; i <= 100; i++) {
h = Insert(h, i);
}
for (int i=0; i <= 13; ++i) {
printf("Max value: %d\n", top(h));
pop(h);
}
ReleaseHeap(h);
}

class Heap {
public $arr; // æ•°ç»„ä¿å­˜å †æ•°æ®
public $n; // å †å¯ä»¥å­˜å‚¨çš„æœ€å¤§æ•°æ®ä¸ªæ•°
public $count; // å †ä¸­å·²ç»å­˜å‚¨å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°

public function __construct($capacity) {
$this->n = $capacity;
$this->count = 0;
}

// åˆ é™¤å †é¡¶å…ƒç´ 
public function removeMax() {
if ($this->count == 0) {
echo "å †ä¸ºç©º!";
return false;
}
$this->arr[1] = $this->arr[$this->count];
unset($this->arr[$this->count]);
$this->count--;
$this->heapify(1);
}

// æ•°æ®å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨äº†è‡ªä¸Šå¾€ä¸‹å †åŒ–
public function buildHeap() {
for ($i=intval($this->count/2);$i >= 1;$i--) {
$this->heapify($i);
}
}

// æ’åº
public function sort() {
// å»ºå †
$this->buildHeap();
$k = $this->count;
while($k > 1) {
$tmp = $this->arr[$k];
$this->arr[$k] = $this->arr[1];
$this->arr[1] = $tmp;
$k--;
// å†æ¬¡å»ºå †
$this->heapify(1,$k);
}
}
// ä»ä¸Šå¾€ä¸‹å †åŒ–
private function heapify($i,$k=0) {
while (true) {
$maxPos=$i;
// å’Œå½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸­å¤§è€…äº¤æ¢
if (empty($k)) {
if ($i*2 <= $this->count && $this->arr[$i] < $this->arr[$i*2]) {
$maxPos = $i*2;
}

if (($i*2 + 1) <= $this->count && $this->arr[$maxPos] < $this->arr[$i*2 + 1]) {
$maxPos = $i*2+1;
}
} else {
if ($i*2 <= $k && $this->arr[$i] < $this->arr[$i*2]) {
$maxPos = $i*2;
}

if (($i*2 + 1) <= $k && $this->arr[$maxPos] < $this->arr[$i*2 + 1]) {
$maxPos = $i*2+1;
}
}


if ($maxPos == $i) {
break;
}

// äº¤æ¢
$tmp = $this->arr[$maxPos];
$this->arr[$maxPos] = $this->arr[$i];
$this->arr[$i] = $tmp;
$i = $maxPos;
}
}

// æ·»åŠ æ•°æ® è‡ªä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šå †åŒ–
public function insert($data) {
if ($this->count >= $this->n) { // å †æ»¡
echo "å †æ»¡<br>";
}

$this->count++;
$this->arr[$this->count] = $data;
$j = $this->count;
$i = intval($j / 2);
while ($i > 0 && $this->arr[$j] > $this->arr[$i]) { // è‡ªä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šå †åŒ–
// äº¤æ¢
$tmp = $this->arr[$j];
$this->arr[$j] = $this->arr[$i];
$this->arr[$i] = $tmp;
$j = $i;
$i = intval($j / 2);
}
}
}

è‡ªå·±å¤§è‡´å†™ä¸‹å †æ’åºï¼Œè€å¸ˆå¸®å¿™çœ‹ä¸‹å“¦ã€‚ç•™è¨€é™åˆ¶2000å­—ï¼Œè´´ä»£ç ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆæ–¹ä¾¿
public class HeapSort {
class Heap {
private int count;
private int[] content;
Heap(int size) {content = new int[size];}
boolean insertData(int data) {
count++;
if (count >= content.length) {
return Boolean.FALSE;
}
content[count] = data;heapifyDownToUp(content, count);return Boolean.TRUE;
}
boolean removeMax() {
if (count == 0) {
return Boolean.FALSE;
}
content[1] = content[count];count--;heapifyUpToDown(content, 1, count);return Boolean.TRUE;
}
int[] sort() {
int k = count;
while (true) {swap(content, 1, k);if (k == 1) {break;}k--;heapifyUpToDown(content, 1, k);}
return content;
}
}
public void sort(int[] content) {Heap heap = buildHeap(content);System.out.println(Arrays.toString(heap.sort()));}
private Heap buildHeap(int[] content) {Heap heap = new Heap(content.length + 1);for (int data : content) {heap.insertData(data);}return heap;}
private void heapifyUpToDown(int[] content, int index, int count) {
while (true) {
int maxIndex = index;if (2 * index < count && content[index] < content[2 * index]) {maxIndex = 2 * index;}if ((2 * index + 1) < count && content[maxIndex] < content[2 * index + 1]) {maxIndex = 2 * index + 1;}
if (maxIndex == index) {break;}swap(content, maxIndex, index);index = maxIndex;
}
}
private void swap(int[] content, int index, int swapIndex) {int temp = content[swapIndex];content[swapIndex] = content[index];content[index] = temp;}
private void heapifyDownToUp(int[] content, int index) {
boolean flag = true;
while (flag) {flag = false;int parentIndex = index / 2;if (index > 1 && content[parentIndex] < content[index]) {flag = true;swap(content, parentIndex, index);index = parentIndex;}}
}}

å»ºå †çš„ä»£ç å†™çš„æœ‰é—®é¢˜å§ï¼Œæˆ‘åœ¨vsä¸Šæ‰§è¡Œå‘ç°ç»“æœä¸å¯¹å•Š

private static void buildHeap(int[] a, int n) {
for (int i = n/2; i >= 1; --i) {
heapify(a, n, i);
}
}

private static void heapify(int[] a, int n, int i) {
while (true) {
int maxPos = i;
if (i*2 <= n && a[i] < a[i*2]) maxPos = i*2;
else if (i*2+1 <= n && a[maxPos] < a[i*2+1]) maxPos = i*2+1;
else if (maxPos == i) break;
swap(a, i, maxPos);
i = maxPos;
}
}
